body:
If you are not able to find the answer you need in our Support Center, we welcome you to contact us:

  • Email
  • Chat
  • Phone


Email

We provide 24-hour global support by email. Click here to open a ticket.

This is your best option if you need help with a specific troubleshooting or non-urgent request. Email allows us to take some time to get familiar with your account, which is why it is best suited for topics and require a little more investigating.

Troubleshooting
  • Your SmartPixel won't activate.
  • Audience segments are not populating.
  • You need help setting up enhanced conversion tracking.
  • Your campaign is not serving.
  • You need help with Facebook integration.
Account
  • You want clarification on the campaign notification you received.
  • You're ready for your campaign/ad to be reviewed again.
  • You are following up on a bad transaction notification.
  • You want an explanation of your billing history.
  • You want help with understanding your campaign performance.
  • You want to check in on your Design Squad request.

Chat

We are available to chat during the business week.

Live Chat is best if you want a walkthrough or need quick help with something.

Walkthrough
  • Launching a campaign.
  • Audience segment strategy.
  • Setting up a conversion segment.
  • Your new dashboard.

Account
  • You are having trouble logging in.
  • You want to adjust your frequency cap.
  • You have a promo code to apply to your account balance.
  • You need us to expedite campaign or ad approval.
  • You just want to say hi!

Phone

We are available at 1-877-7ADROLL during the business week, between 9AM - 5PM PT. If you are in EMEA, you may want to try us at our Dublin office, +353 1 653 2009.

Phones are best if you want to get general information about AdRoll. Otherwise, we highly recommend reaching out via email or chat as phone availability is the most limited of our three support channels.
name: We're here to help!
title: We're here to help!
